TopicTitle: Realistic Stock Boeing USAF X-37B Unmanned Spaceplane with Fairings!

Articles.Content:
This is a realistic and stock recreation of the USAF/Boeing X-37B Unmanned Spaceplane.

Can launch 2 ton probe, stock fairings, realistic launch characteristics.

Craft File

This is a realistic and stock recreation of the USAF/Boeing X-37B Unmanned Spaceplane.

Can launch 2 ton probe, stock fairings, realistic launch characteristics.

Javascript is disabled. View full album
I'm pretty sure that the X-37's smaller than that, but nice job anyways!

Nice job, Westi29! Good to see you've been working hard

Btw, I recommend you to visit Marjorjim's X-37b thread to see how you can improve your replica

Hi Westi,

You're X-37 orbiter is good man, big cargo space! As Yukon says its a little large but that's a limit of the SP+ part sizes. the rocket itself could be improved with a new fairing.

There are plenty of good fairing makers on this forum and most are built in a similar way. So a download of one and an hour or so to pick it apart will give you some ideas about how to improve it.

I see you are mainly a SSTO builder so this is a good effort indeed. My SSTO's are usually not great..

Keep up the good work mate!

MJ
